original_text:
My bones stick to my skin and to my flesh,
    and I have escaped by the skin of my teeth.
korean_text: 내 피부와 살이 뼈에 붙었고 남은 것은 겨우 잇몸 뿐이로구나

sentences.original_text: My bones stick to my skin and to my flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 내 뼈가 내 살갗과 살에 달라붙었네

sentences.original_text: and I have escaped by the skin of my teeth.
